tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My tooth filling had came out, which was done long back, visited 2 doctors before this both of them suggested for tooth canal as I was doubtful to go ahead was bearing with the pain from 2 months. After i visited this clinic doctor explained the situation and suggested tooth canal was not required just filled the tooth and fixed a crown.

Visited doc with a gum infection and a cavity, However i was anxious about the procedure in the beginning, but the service I recieved has beyond my expectations. Almost a pain-free root canal treatment and reassurance throughout the procedure. Thankyou so much doctor Naveen!

The services that I receive from Dr Naveen N is excellent.¬†
He explained everything to me in a very clear manner.
It‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touch and care for a patient. I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a specialist.

***** ** *** **** *********** ** ***** ** ******* ********* ** ****** *** ** **** ** ****** ** *** I went to extract my left out piece of tooth which is evident poping out. *** **** *** forcefully took xray  and came out with solution that this is left out piece of tooth which is already extracted and has to be removed and when i asked him can he extract it.‚Äù, answer was he has to arange the surgeon for it . ** **** **** **** * ***** ** **** ****** *** *** * ** **** *** ** ***** ** * ********** ** **** *******

review: Dr Naveen has been my family dentist since 2015. We're very satisfied with his method of treatment. He is a very friendly person

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had an amazing experience with Dr.Naveen. The problem was clearly explained to us along with the method for treatment and all the available options with their respective pros and cons. The treatment was done at the same timeline which was mentioned at the beginning without any delay and excellent results. Very happy with the result.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Naveen is very kind , he explains each step he is conducting, he makes us understand every single steps very meaningfully, he's our family dentist since lmost a decade , one who visits him once the patient always remembers his humbleness . Some times he is adjusted to our time. Overall I rate 5***** 
Thank u doctor
